issue.title: Metadata with a "endpublished" date in the past are returned by the search
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

The CSW query built by the search must include those permanent criterias (beside others already in) :

- endpublished isGreaterOrEqualTo 'now'
OR
- endpublished isEqualTo '0000-00-00 00:00:00' (default empty value)

**Fixed versions :** 4.3.3
